author: Brodie Robertson
description:
Every time some new tech comes along I keep witnessing the same arguments happening on Linux over and over again, whether it's Wayland, Systemd, Pulseaudio, and now with uutils the Rust rewrite of the GNU core utils.

title: Linux History Keeps Repeating Itself
